title: Workshop on Technology-Mediated Science Learning Design Research

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Scientific Concepts and Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Weekend-intensive course for working professionals, focusing on science learning design integrated with real-life contexts

learning_goals: Explain systematic methods for designing science learning activities using technological tools
Propose three or more personalized strategies (e.g., difficulty level, feedback methods) tailored to learner characteristics
Develop a prototype of a science class model integrating collaborative learning platforms with digital content
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
